Package Model

Class Movie

java.lang.Object
Model.Movie
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Movie extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a Movie It has an ID, name, type, synopsis, rating, director, list of cast, duration, start date, end date, and list of ratings in that movie
See Also:

    Creates a new Movie with the given movie ID, name, type, synopsis, rating, duration, start date, end date, director, cast list, and rating list

    int
    getID()
    Gets the ID of this Movie.
    Model.MovieStatus
    getMovieStatus()
    Get the movie status of the Movie The status is derived from the difference between the start/end date and today's date If today's date is after the end date of the movie, it will return "End_Of_Showing" ELse If the Movie's start date is more than 7 days after today's date, it will return "Coming_Soon" Else If the Movie's start date is less than 7 days after today's date, it will return "Preview" Else, it will return "Now_Showing"

    • getMovieStatus

      public Model.MovieStatus getMovieStatus()
      Get the movie status of the Movie The status is derived from the difference between the start/end date and today's date If today's date is after the end date of the movie, it will return "End_Of_Showing" ELse If the Movie's start date is more than 7 days after today's date, it will return "Coming_Soon" Else If the Movie's start date is less than 7 days after today's date, it will return "Preview" Else, it will return "Now_Showing"
      Returns:
      MovieStatus Movie status of this Movie
